Package agg.attribute

Interface Summary
AttrConditionMember The interface for an instance tuple member.
AttrConditionTuple The interface for a condition tuple.
AttrContext Framework for allocation of variables, administration of attribute mappings and application conditions in rules.
AttrDistributionBroker Mediator interface for distribution purposes.
AttrEvent Attribute event interface for delivering information about attribute changes to clients.
AttrInstance Interface of tuples of attribute values.
AttrInstanceMember The interface for an instance tuple member.
AttrManager Factory class interface for attribute-related objects; Provides creating services needed by graphical components.
AttrMapping  
AttrMember An abstract tuple member interface.
AttrObserver  
AttrTuple  
AttrType A tuple of declarations each consisting of a type and name.
AttrTypeMember The interface for a member of an attribute type.
AttrVariableMember The interface for a variable tuple member.
AttrVariableTuple The interface for a tuple of variables.
 

Exception Summary
AttrException  
AttrMatchException
